timelinefxjs demo

    timelinefxjs demo

    JavaScript port of the timelinefx particle system
    with pixijs rendering

    Select a particle effect from the menu at left.

    The timelinefxjs Github repository (including this demo) can be found here

    This demo works best in modern browsers with WebGL support. While pixijs will fallback to canvas mode rendering, performance will sufffer particulary for effects with many particles. The timelinefxjs module itself is independant of rendering, and can be integrated with other html5 game engines or renderers.
